name: Unamano
introduce: Unamano is a ETH2.0 Staking & Project DAOs Protocol, staking ETH to earn multiple crypto assets. Users can earn projects token rewards by staking ETH to the smart contract of the project they want to support on Unamano platform. Project side only needs to create a DAO to sustain the rewards generated by ETH Staking as a development fund for the project. All stakes will serve as DAOs for different projects, and all assets are managed by smart contracts.
